messages.content:
Create a basic todo app for me

<project_files>

│   ├── models/

    │       ├── ProfilePage.tsx

</project_files>

I'll create a basic todo app for you with full-stack functionality. Let me break this down into steps:

<action type="todo_create" id="todo_models" priority="high" integration="false">
Create Pydantic models for Todo items
</action>

<action type="todo_create" id="todo_backend" priority="high" integration="false">
Create backend API endpoints for todo CRUD operations
</action>

<action type="todo_create" id="todo_frontend" priority="high" integration="true">
Create frontend UI for todo management with API integration
</action>

<action type="todo_create" id="todo_navigation" priority="medium" integration="true">
Add Todo navigation to the sidebar
</action>

Let me start by creating the todo models:

<action type="file" filePath="backend/models/todo.py">
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import Optional
from datetime import datetime
from enum import Enum

class TodoStatus(str, Enum):
    pending = "pending"
    completed = "completed"

class TodoBase(BaseModel):
    title: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=200)
    description: Optional[str] = Field(None, max_length=1000)
    status: TodoStatus = TodoStatus.pending

class TodoCreate(TodoBase):
    pass

class TodoUpdate(BaseModel):
    title: Optional[str] = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=200)
    description: Optional[str] = Field(None, max_length=1000)
    status: Optional[TodoStatus] = None

class TodoResponse(TodoBase):
    id: int
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime

    class Config:
        from_attributes = True
</action>

<action_result type="create_file_realtime" file_path="backend/models/todo.py">

✅ File 'backend/models/todo.py' created.

**Static Analysis Results:**
Python validation errors:
✅ No Python errors found - Backend is ready to run!

**NEXT STEPS:**
1. Fix these static errors first
2. If this is a backend service, create a test file (e.g., `backend/test_api.py`) to verify it works
3. Run the test file with `python backend/test_api.py`
4. Fix any runtime errors
5. Delete the test file when done

Continue with your implementation and testing.


</action_result>
